Title: Crypt Flayers
Legend: Monstrous predators of the sky, Crypt Flayers flock together in a beating of dark wings and hissing maws. Enemies are snatched up by their sudden strikes and torn asunder while the creatures’ keening call is enough to break a warrior’s spirit.

PitchBattleProfile.Notes: Battleline in a Blisterskin army or if general is a Crypt Infernal Courtier

Intro: Each model in a Crypt Flayers unit is armed with a Death Scream and Piercing Talons.

Rules.Name: Battalions
Rules.Rule: BATTALIONS: This warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Deadwatch • Royal Mordants • Mortevell’s Helcourt

Rules.Name: Champion
Rules.Rule: CHAMPION: 1 model in this unit can be a Crypt Infernal. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s Piercing Talons.

Rules.Name: Death Scream
Rules.Fluff: Crypt Flayers can unleash an ultrasonic cry that can kill or debilitate their victims.
Rules.Rule: Add 1 to wound rolls for attacks made with a Death Scream if the target unit has a Bravery characteristic of 6 or less.

Rules.Name: Escort Courtier
Rules.Fluff: There are many ghoulish legends of Crypt Flayers winging down to lift noble heroes into the sky, either plucking them from danger or carrying them into the fray.
Rules.Rule: When you pick this unit to move in the movement phase, you can pick 1 friendly FLESH-EATER COURTS HERO that has a Wounds characteristic of 7 or less, that cannot fly, and that is wholly within 3" of this unit. If you do so, remove that HERO from the battlefield. After this unit has finished moving, set up that HERO wholly within 3" of this unit and more than 3" from all enemy units.
